article_title: Costs of Idaho’s low-income health plan would be ‘managed very closely’
article_text:
Demand for proposed program, health needs of participants hard to predict

Waiting list a possibility to contain costs

article_metadata.news-keywords: Boise, Idaho, ID, Legislature, state, government, Otter, Senate, House, Iowa, Capitol, Capital, BOI, Armstrong, health, care, uninsured, insurance, Medicaid, expansion
article_metadata.description: More details emerged Monday on the proposed state-sponsored basic health care plan for low-income Idahoans, as Health and Welfare Director Richard Armstrong gave legislative budget writers his department’s spending overview for the next year.
article_metadata.title: Costs of Idaho’s low-income health plan would be ‘managed very closely’ | Idaho Statesman
